au.org.massive.strudel_web.ssh

Class ForkedSSHClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.org.massive.strudel_web.ssh.AbstractSSHClient
      • au.org.massive.strudel_web.ssh.ForkedSSHClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SSHClient

    public class ForkedSSHClient
extends AbstractSSHClient
    A non-native SSH client implmentation that forks SSH processes for each request. Depends on an SSH binary in the search path. Certificates are written to disk at the beginning of each command and deleted upon command completion.
    Author:
    jrigby
